column1: Smoque BBQ////I try to be fair when writing a review my experience with this restaurant was take out and ribs. I was very disappointed in rib entrée. The ribs were tough
column2: not very meaty and lacked the flavor one would expect from such a popular restaurant who's very name screams what should be delicious!  I would not recommend this restaurant for ribs. I also had a side if bbq bean that weren't bad. Now to be fair some of my friends and family get the pulled pork sandwiches from there and they love it. So
column3: my recommendation is if you're looking for good ribs...look elsewhere but if you're looking for a pulled pork sandwich. .. give it a try. Happy dining :)
